desc: Pure and aromatic cow ghee, ideal for cooking and enhancing the flavor of traditional dishes.
Cold-pressed mustard oil, rich in omega-3 and ideal for healthy cooking.
Whole wheat flour, rich in fiber and essential nutrients for making soft rotis and chapatis.
Pure gram flour, perfect for making pakoras, chillas, and other traditional Indian dishes.
High-quality basmati rice, naturally aged for great taste and aroma.
Nutrient-rich dal (pulses), an essential source of plant-based protein.
Pure and natural honey, a great immunity booster and natural sweetener.
Premium quality milk powder, ideal for tea, coffee, and other dairy-based preparations.
Aromatic and pure Indian spices, including turmeric, cumin, and coriander, for flavorful cooking.
Patanjali Amla Chatpata Candy is a delicious and tangy treat made from pure amla (Indian gooseberry). It is rich in Vitamin C, supports digestion, and boosts immunity.

Patanjali Dant Kanti is an ayurvedic toothpaste enriched with natural herbs that help strengthen teeth, fight germs, and maintain fresh breath. It is free from harmful chemicals and provides complete oral care.
